sense.gloss: to melt into, to dissolve into, to merge into
to blend into (surroundings), to fit in, to adapt to, to integrate

sdata.j: ↑空↑↓そら↓が↑海↑↓うみ↓と↑一↑↓ひと↓つに↑溶↑↓|と↓け↑込↑↓こ↓む|ように↑見↑↓み↓えた。
sdata.e: The sky seemed to blend with the sea.

sdata.j: ↑例↑↓たと↓えば、カメレオンは↑皮膚↑↓ひふ↓の↑色↑↓いろ↓を↑変↑↓か↓え、↑回↑↓まわ↓りの↑木↑↓き↓や↑葉↑↓は↓っぱに|とけ↑込↑↓こ↓む|ことが↑出来↑↓でき↓る。
sdata.e: For example, chameleons can change the color of their skin and blend with the trees and leaves around them.

sdata.j: ↑帰国↑↓きこく↓↑子女↑↓しじょ↓があの↑組↑↓くみ↓の↑中↑↓なか↓に↑溶↑↓|と↓け↑込↑↓こ↓む|のは↑難↑↓むずか↓しいよ。
sdata.e: It's difficult for returnees to blend in with that class.
